description: Deletes a user pool identity provider (IdP). After you delete an IdP, users can no longer sign in to your user pool through that IdP. For more information about user pool IdPs, see Third-party IdP sign-in.

parameters.name: UserPoolId
parameters.description: The ID of the user pool where you want to delete the identity provider.

parameters.name: ProviderName
parameters.description: The name of the IdP that you want to delete.
